price: ከዚያም (ቅርጹን) አስተካከለው፡፡ በእርሱ ውስጥም ከመንፈሱ ነፋበት፤ (ነፍስ ዘራበት)፡፡ ለእናንተም ጆሮዎችን፣ ዓይኖችንና ልቦችንም አደረገላችሁ፡፡ በጣም ጥቂትን ብቻ ታመሰግናላችሁ፡፡
arabic: ثُمَّ سَوَّىٰهُ وَنَفَخَ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِهِۦۖ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَ وَٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةَۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma sawwāhu wanafakha fīhi min rūḥihi wajaʿala lakumu al-samʿa wal-abṣāra wal-afidata qalīlan mā tashkurūna
